p: Arbidol (umifenovir) is a broad-spectrum antiviral compound approved in Russia and China for prophylaxis and treatment of influenza. This compound shows activities against numerous DNA and RNA viruses [ 27]. Arbidol was found to be effective to SARS-CoV-2 in vitro [ 28]. Arbidol is available in oral dosage forms in China and Russia [ 29]. The dosage regimen of arbidol (0.2 g every time, twice daily, not be given over 10 days) in adults with COVID-19 was recommended [ 1]. There is no recommendation of dosage regimen of arbidol in children with COVID-19 so far.
